curam.util.rules.evidence

Class EvidenceList

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.util.rules.evidence.EvidenceList

  • public class EvidenceList
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains list of evidence used in the rules execution.

                                                    java.lang.String nodeID)
                                             throws AppException
        Get evidence XML for a single rule identified by the node ID.
        Parameters:
        buffer - result buffer
        nodeID - node ID
        Returns:
        XML string containing the evidence information related to the specified rule.
        Throws:
        AppException - generic exception signature.

      • getListRDOSize

        public int getListRDOSize(java.lang.String rdoName,
                          java.lang.String subrulesetContextID)
        Returns the list RDO size.
        Parameters:
        rdoName - list RDO name
        subrulesetContextID - local sub rule set context ID. This ID represents the context of the sub rule set that is executed in the local context. The format of sub rule set context ID is [ParentRuleSetID]_[SubrulesetID]_[ID of sub rule set link element]. Pass empty String if there is no sub rule set context ID.
        Returns:
        the size of the list RDO.

      • getDataItemFinalValue

        public java.lang.String getDataItemFinalValue(java.lang.String rdoName,
                                              java.lang.String dataItemName,
                                              int listIterationNumber,
                                              java.lang.String subrulesetContextID)
                                       throws AppException
        Returns the last value of the specified RDO data item.
        Parameters:
        rdoName - RDO name
        dataItemName - Data item name
        listIterationNumber - list RDO iteration number. If the RDO is not a list RDO then 0 should be passed.
        subrulesetContextID - local sub rule set context ID. This ID represents the context of the sub rule set that is executed in the local context. The format of sub rule set context ID is [ParentRuleSetID]_[SubrulesetID]_[ID of sub rule set link element]. Pass empty String if there is no sub rule set context ID.
        Returns:
        the last value of the specified data item. It returns null if the value is not found.
        Throws:
        AppException - generic exception signature

      • getDataItemLastValue

        public java.lang.String getDataItemLastValue(java.lang.String rdoName,
                                             java.lang.String dataItemName,
                                             java.lang.String descriptionValue,
                                             java.lang.String subrulesetContextID)
                                      throws AppException
        Returns the last value of the give RDO data item.
        Parameters:
        rdoName - RDO name
        dataItemName - Data item name
        descriptionValue - list RDO description. If the RDO is not a list RDO then null should be passed.
        subrulesetContextID - local sub rule set context ID. This ID represents the context of the sub rule set that is executed in the local context. The format of sub rule set context ID is [ParentRuleSetID]_[SubrulesetID]_[ID of sub rule set link element]. Pass empty String if there is no sub rule set context ID.
        Returns:
        the last value of the give data item. It returns empty string if the value is not found.
        Throws:
        AppException - generic exception signature

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        XML data.
